description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Blossoms by the Way. A collection of choice poems. Edited by C. A. Cooke. Border designs by Sweeney" Author: COOKE, Carrie Adelaide. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
